pli-tv-kd7:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd7:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena tiṃsamattā pāveyyakā bhikkhū, sabbe āraññikā sabbe piṇḍapātikā sabbe paṃsukūlikā sabbe tecīvarikā sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya nāsakkhiṃsu sāvatthiyaṃ vassūpanāyikaṃ sambhāvetuṃ;
pli-tv-kd7:1.1.4: Te ukkaṇṭhitarūpā vassaṃ vasiṃsu—āsanneva no bhagavā viharati ito chasu yojanesu, na ca mayaṃ labhāma bhagavantaṃ dassanāyāti.
pli-tv-kd7:1.1.5: yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd7:1.1.6: yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.1: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.2: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.4: kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.6: samaggā ca mayaṃ, bhante, sammodamānā avivadamānā vassaṃ vasimhā, na ca piṇḍakena kilamimhā.
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.7: Idha mayaṃ, bhante, tiṃsamattā pāveyyakā bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ āgacchantā bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya nāsakkhimhā sāvatthiyaṃ vassūpanāyikaṃ sambhāvetuṃ, antarāmagge sākete vassaṃ upagacchimhā.
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.8: Te mayaṃ, bhante, ukkaṇṭhitarūpā vassaṃ vasimhā—
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.9: ‘āsanneva no bhagavā viharati ito chasu yojanesu, na ca mayaṃ labhāma bhagavantaṃ dassanāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd7:1.2.10: Atha kho mayaṃ, bhante, vassaṃvuṭṭhā, temāsaccayena katāya pavāraṇāya, deve vassante, udakasaṅgahe udakacikkhalle okapuṇṇehi cīvarehi kilantarūpā addhānaṃ āgatā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:1.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd7:1.3.4: anāmantacāro, asamādānacāro, gaṇabhojanaṃ, yāvadatthacīvaraṃ, yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo so nesaṃ bhavissatīti.
pli-tv-kd7:1.3.5: Atthatakathinānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, imāni pañca kappissanti.
pli-tv-kd7:1.4.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.4.8: Saṃgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.4.9: Yassāyasmato khamati imassa kathinadussassa itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dānaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd7:1.4.11: Dinnaṃ idaṃ saṃghena kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.4.12: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.1: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, evaṃ anatthataṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.2: Kathañca pana, bhikkhave, anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ?
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.21: na aññatra saṅghāṭiyā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ,
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.22: na aññatra uttarāsaṅgena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ,
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.23: na aññatra antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ,
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.24: na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnena samaṇḍalīkatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ,
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.25: na aññatra puggalassa atthārā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ;
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.26: sammā ce atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, tañce nissīmaṭṭho anumodati, evampi anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.5.27: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.6.2: Ahatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, ahatakappena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pilotikāya atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, paṃsukūlena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pāpaṇikena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, animittakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, aparikathākatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, akukkukatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, asannidhikatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, anissaggiyena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, kappakatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, saṅghāṭiyā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, uttarāsaṅgena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, antaravāsakena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnena samaṇḍalīkatena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, puggalassa atthārā atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ; sammā ce atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ, tañce sīmaṭṭho anumodati, evampi atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ.
pli-tv-kd7:1.7.3: pakkamanantikā, niṭṭhānantikā, sanniṭṭhānantikā, nāsanantikā, savanantikā, āsāvacchedikā, sīmātikkantikā, sahubbhārā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:2.1.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino katacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati—“na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:2.1.4: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:2.1.8: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:2.1.11: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:2.1.12: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:2.2.3: So katacīvaro suṇāti “ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinan”ti.

pli-tv-kd7:4.1.20: So katacīvaro “paccessaṃ paccessan”ti bahiddhā kathinuddhāraṃ vītināmeti.

pli-tv-kd7:8.1.4: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:8.1.10: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:8.1.15: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:8.1.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:8.1.19: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:8.1.20: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:8.2.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:8.2.19: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:8.2.20: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:8.3.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino cīvarāsāya pakkamati anadhiṭṭhitena; nevassa hoti—“paccessan”ti, na panassa hoti—“na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:8.3.4: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.

pli-tv-kd7:8.3.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.

pli-tv-kd7:9.1.4: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.1.10: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.1.15: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.1.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.1.19: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.1.20: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.2: So bahisīmagato suṇāti—“ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.3: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“yato tasmiṃ āvāse ubbhataṃ kathinaṃ, idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.4: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Āsāya labhati, anāsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.5: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.9: So bahisīmagato suṇāti—“ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.10: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“yato tasmiṃ āvāse ubbhataṃ kathinaṃ, idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.11: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Āsāya labhati, anāsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.12: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.15: So bahisīmagato suṇāti—“ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.16: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“yato tasmiṃ āvāse ubbhataṃ kathinaṃ, idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.17: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Āsāya labhati, anāsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.18: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.19: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.22: So bahisīmagato suṇāti—“ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.23: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“yato tasmiṃ āvāse ubbhataṃ kathinaṃ, idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.2.24: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:9.3.2: So bahisīmagato taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Āsāya labhati, anāsāya na labhati. So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.3.3: So katacīvaro suṇāti—“ubbhataṃ kira tasmiṃ āvāse kathinan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.3.6: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:9.3.7: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.

pli-tv-kd7:9.3.15: So bahisīmagato taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Āsāya labhati, anāsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.3: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.4: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.9: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.10: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.14: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.15: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.20: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.1.21: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati “na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.3: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.7: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati “na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.9: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.12: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati “na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.14: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.18: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati “na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.2.21: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati anadhiṭṭhitena; nevassa hoti—“paccessan”ti, na panassa hoti—“na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.3: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.4: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.7: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati anadhiṭṭhitena; nevassa hoti—“paccessan”ti, na panassa hoti—“na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.9: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.10: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.12: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati anadhiṭṭhitena; nevassa hoti—“paccessan”ti, na panassa hoti—“na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.14: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Anāsāya labhati, āsāya na labhati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.15: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.18: Bhikkhu atthatakathino kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkamati anadhiṭṭhitena; nevassa hoti—“paccessan”ti, na panassa hoti—“na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.20: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsissaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:10.3.21: So taṃ cīvarāsaṃ payirupāsati. Tassa sā cīvarāsā upacchijjati.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino disaṅgamiko pakkamati cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ apavilāyamāno.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.2: Tamenaṃ disaṃgataṃ bhikkhū pucchanti—“kahaṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, vassaṃvuṭṭho, kattha ca te cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.3: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃvuṭṭhomhi. Tattha ca me cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.4: Te evaṃ vadanti—“gacchāvuso, taṃ cīvaraṃ āhara, mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.5: So taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchati—“kahaṃ me, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.6: Te evaṃ vadanti—“ayaṃ te, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso; kahaṃ gamissasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.7: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi, tattha me bhikkhū cīvaraṃ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.8: Te evaṃ vadanti—“alaṃ, āvuso, mā agamāsi. Mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.9: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.1.17: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino disaṅgamiko pakkamati cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ apavilāyamāno.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.2: Tamenaṃ disaṃgataṃ bhikkhū pucchanti—“kahaṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, vassaṃvuṭṭho, kattha ca te cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.3: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃvuṭṭhomhi, tattha ca me cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.4: Te evaṃ vadanti—“gacchāvuso, taṃ cīvaraṃ āhara, mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.5: So taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchati—“kahaṃ me, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.6: Te evaṃ vadanti—“ayaṃ te, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.7: So taṃ cīvaraṃ ādāya taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.8: Tamenaṃ antarāmagge bhikkhū pucchanti—“āvuso, kahaṃ gamissasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.9: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi, tattha me bhikkhū cīvaraṃ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.10: Te evaṃ vadanti—“alaṃ, āvuso, mā agamāsi, mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.11: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.14: Bhikkhu atthatakathino disaṅgamiko pakkamati cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ apavilāyamāno.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.15: Tamenaṃ disaṃgataṃ bhikkhū pucchanti—“kahaṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, vassaṃvuṭṭho, kattha ca te cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.16: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃvuṭṭhomhi, tattha ca me cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.17: Te evaṃ vadanti—“gacchāvuso, taṃ cīvaraṃ āhara, mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.18: So taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchati—“kahaṃ me, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.19: Te evaṃ vadanti—“ayaṃ te, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.20: So taṃ cīvaraṃ ādāya taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.21: Tamenaṃ antarāmagge bhikkhū pucchanti—“āvuso, kahaṃ gamissasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.22: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi, tattha me bhikkhū cīvaraṃ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.23: Te evaṃ vadanti—“alaṃ, āvuso, mā agamāsi, mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.24: Tassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.2.28: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino disaṅgamiko pakkamati cīvarapaṭivīsaṃ apavilāyamāno.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.2: Tamenaṃ disaṃgataṃ bhikkhū pucchanti—“kahaṃ tvaṃ, āvuso, vassaṃvuṭṭho, kattha ca te cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.3: So evaṃ vadeti—“amukasmiṃ āvāse vassaṃvuṭṭhomhi, tattha ca me cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.4: Te evaṃ vadanti—“gacchāvuso, taṃ cīvaraṃ āhara, mayaṃ te idha cīvaraṃ karissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.5: So taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchati—“kahaṃ me, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti?
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.6: Te evaṃ vadanti—“ayaṃ te, āvuso, cīvarapaṭivīso”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.7: So taṃ cīvaraṃ ādāya taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.8: Tassa taṃ āvāsaṃ gatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:11.3.16: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.1: Bhikkhu atthatakathino phāsuvihāriko cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati—
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.3: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.4: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.5: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.6: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.9: Bhikkhu atthatakathino phāsuvihāriko cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati—
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.11: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.12: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.13: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.14: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.16: Bhikkhu atthatakathino phāsuvihāriko cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati—“amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.17: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.18: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.19: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.20: Tassa bahisīmagatassa evaṃ hoti—“idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ kāressaṃ, na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.21: So taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti. Tassa taṃ cīvaraṃ kayiramānaṃ nassati.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.23: Bhikkhu atthatakathino phāsuvihāriko cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati—“amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.24: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.25: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.26: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.28: So katacīvaro—“paccessaṃ paccessan”ti bahiddhā kathinuddhāraṃ vītināmeti.
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.30: Bhikkhu atthatakathino phāsuvihāriko cīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati—“amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.31: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.32: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, amukaṃ nāma āvāsaṃ gamissāmi;
pli-tv-kd7:12.1.33: tattha me phāsu bhavissati vasissāmi, no ce me phāsu bhavissati, paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:13.1.1: Dveme, bhikkhave, kathinassa palibodhā, dve apalibodhā.
pli-tv-kd7:13.1.2: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa palibodhā?
pli-tv-kd7:13.1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vasati vā tasmiṃ āvāse, sāpekkho vā pakkamati “paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:13.1.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ akataṃ vā hoti vippakataṃ vā, cīvarāsā vā anupacchinnā.
pli-tv-kd7:13.1.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa palibodhā.
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa apalibodhā?
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pakkamati tamhā āvāsā cattena vantena muttena anapekkho “na paccessan”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ kataṃ vā hoti, naṭṭhaṃ vā vinaṭṭhaṃ vā daḍḍhaṃ vā, cīvarāsā vā upacchinnā.
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve kathinassa apalibodhā”ti.
pli-tv-kd7:13.2.124: Imamhi khandhake vatthū doḷasakapeyyālamukhāni ekasataṃ aṭṭhārasa.
